AI Translation Tool to Translate Any Website, Page, or Part of a Page.

Introducing the ConveyThis Chrome Extension, a powerful tool designed to simplify website translation and localization with just a single click. This innovative website translator allows you to translate any website effortlessly, enhancing your browsing experience and enabling seamless communication with global audiences. With additional features like highlighting and translating any word on a page with a right-click, ConveyThis ensures you have complete control over your multilingual content needs.

Key Features:

✔️   One-Click Website Translation: Instantly translate any website with a single click. The ConveyThis Chrome Extension uses advanced AI to provide accurate and context-aware translations.

✔️   Word Highlight and Translate: Highlight any word on a page and translate it with a right-click. This feature is perfect for quick translations and understanding specific terms.

✔️   User-Friendly Interface: The extension is designed for ease of use, making it accessible for users of all technical levels. No coding skills are required.

✔️   Multi-Language Support: Translate websites into over 100 languages, ensuring broad accessibility and engagement.

✔️   Seamless Integration: Integrates smoothly with your existing browser and can complement your WordPress plugin setup for comprehensive website management.



Frequently Asked Questions:

1. How does the ConveyThis Chrome Extension work as a website translator?

The extension uses advanced AI algorithms to analyze and translate website content. Simply click the extension icon to translate the entire website or highlight a specific word and right-click to translate it instantly.

2. Can I translate any website with the ConveyThis Chrome Extension?

Yes, the extension is designed to translate any website you visit, making it a versatile tool for your multilingual needs.

3. How does the word highlight and translate feature work?

You can highlight any word on a webpage and right-click to translate it immediately. This feature is perfect for quick translations and understanding specific terms without translating the entire page.

4. Is the Chrome extension compatible with other tools like the WordPress plugin?

Absolutely! The ConveyThis Chrome Extension complements your existing website translation tools, including the WordPress plugin, providing a comprehensive solution for website localization.

5. How many languages can the Chrome extension translate?

The extension supports translations into over 100 languages, enabling you to communicate effectively with a global audience.

6. Can I customize the translations provided by the extension?

Yes, you can review, edit, and approve translations to ensure they align with your brand's voice and tone, giving you complete control over your multilingual content.

7. What support is available for users of the Chrome extension?

We offer comprehensive support for all users. Our dedicated support team is ready to assist you with installation, customization, and any other questions you may have. Simply email us at: support@conveythis.com
